name: Deployment Issue
about: Report issues with the automated deployment
title: '[DEPLOY] '
labels: deployment, bug
assignees: ''
---

## Deployment Issue Description

**What happened?**
A clear and concise description of what the deployment issue is.

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots of the GitHub Actions logs or error messages.

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.

## Checklist

- [ ] GitHub Pages is enabled in repository settings
- [ ] Source is set to "GitHub Actions" in Pages settings
- [ ] The workflow has the correct permissions
- [ ] The build completed successfully
- [ ] The deployment step completed successfully
